title: AI Employees
description:
AI Employees are not simple chatbots, nor isolated agents. They are intelligent colleagues who understand business context and can directly execute tasks.
Seamlessly integrated into the system, they work alongside humans to bring true automation and intelligence to the enterprise.
description_cn:
AI 员工不是简单的聊天机器人，也不是孤立的 Agent，而是能理解业务上下文、直接执行任务的智能同事。
他们无缝融入系统，与人协同工作，为企业带来真正的自动化与智能化。
description_ja:
AI Employees are not simple chatbots, nor isolated agents. They are intelligent colleagues who understand business context and can directly execute tasks.
Seamlessly integrated into the system, they work alongside humans to bring true automation and intelligence to the enterprise.
